A collection of commands used on Linux and Docker. Updates as sometimes.

Create directory mkdir directory_name

item.title: [Ubuntu] How install Chrome on Ubuntu only CLI
item.description:
1. Install .deb file
Command
$ wget https://dl.google.com/linux/direct/google-chrome-stable_current_amd64.deb or
From Chrome Official
2. Install Chrome
Command
$ sudo apt install ./google-chrome-stable_current_amd64.deb If permission denied(error 13), change the permission of .deb file...
